question: How many of Sony's top video game downloads for the US/Canada in February 2025 will be sports games?
fine_print: A list of Playstation sports games, which Metaculus will consult for resolution, can be found [here](https://www.truetrophies.com/genre/Sports). It defines sports games as follows: "Sports games model an existing sport, complete with a set of rules and organized competition. They do not necessarily have to be simulations and may feature actions which are over-the-top, physically impossible, or not allowed within the real life activity." For example, Gran Turismo 7 is not classified as a sports game by that site, but EA SPORTS FC 25 is.
news:
Here are the relevant news articles:

**Switch Sales Continue to Grow in Japan, PS5 Sales Plummet**
Nintendo Switch sales in Japan continued to grow in January 2025, while Sony PS5 sales plummeted by over 56% to below 81,587 units, a 13-month low. According to Famitsu, Switch sales reached 264,447 units, an 8% increase from the same period last year, marking the second consecutive month of growth and the 23rd consecutive month as the best-selling console in Japan. In contrast, PS5 sales fell to a three-month low, with a 56% decline from the same period last year. As of January, Switch sales have surpassed 35 million units, while PS5 sales have reached 6.5 million units. Compared to the previous month, Switch sales declined by 42% to 45,220 units, while PS5 sales declined by 50% to 16,189 units. In terms of game software sales, Switch games dominated the top 5, with 'Super Mario Party: Big Balloon World' selling around 185,000 copies, taking the top spot for the second consecutive month. Famitsu expects the Japanese gaming market to be boosted by the release of popular games such as 'Yakuza: Like a Dragon 8: Pirates in Hawaii' in February.
Original language: zh
Publish date: February 11, 2025 12:41 AM
Source:[TechNews 科技新報 | 市場和業內人士關心的趨勢、內幕與新聞](https://ccc.technews.tw/2025/02/11/nintendo-switch-january-sales-japan/)

**MLB The Show 25 Confirmed to Have Massive Digital Size on Nintendo Switch**
MLB The Show 25, the upcoming baseball game from Sony, has been confirmed to have a massive digital size of 26.4 GB on Nintendo Switch. According to Nintendo's official website, players will need to have at least 80% of their console's storage free to download the game. The game is set to release on March 18, 2025, and will feature new gameplay mechanics, including RTTS, G.O.A.T difficulty, and improved sound effects. As stated by the game's developers, 'MLB The Show 25 is an exciting new installment that will leave you hooked on baseball, from high school to the Hall of Fame.' The game will also include authentic audio from high schools and universities, as well as improved sound effects and fan chants, thanks to ShowTech.

Publish date: February 10, 2025 06:42 PM

**PS Plus Extra February 2025 reveal time confirmed as fed-up PS5 fans want a 'make good'  - Daily Star**
PlayStation fans are eagerly awaiting the PS Plus Extra titles for February, hoping for a 'make good' after a recent outage. The reveal time is confirmed for 4:30 PM on February 12, and the community is predicting Ubisoft titles, including Assassin's Creed Mirage and Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown. Other popular predictions include Hogwarts Legacy and Resident Evil Village. Sony may choose to include one of its own games, such as God of War or The Last of Us Part II, to sweeten the deal. The current PS Plus Extra titles include Payday 3, High on Life, and Pac-Man World Re-Pac.

Publish date: February 10, 2025 11:36 AM

**PS Plus Extra February 2025 games - Assassin's Creed, Hogwarts Legacy, Robocop**
Fans believe Sony has a 'pretty special' lineup for PS Plus Extra in February. Predictions include Assassin's Creed Mirage, which would give fans a month to play before the release of Assassin's Creed Shadows. Hogwarts Legacy, heavily discounted in price, is also a likely candidate. Other games tipped to appear include Robocop, Atomic Heart, Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown, and annual sports titles like College Football 25 and NBA 2K25. According to fans in the Reddit predictions thread, 'it's going to be a great month for PS Plus Extra'.

**Team U.S. competes in wheelchair basketball during 2025 Invictus Games**
Team U.S. is competing in the 2025 Invictus Games in Vancouver, Canada, with 50 competitors making up the 'Unconquered Team' in wheelchair basketball. The competition, which includes 11 events, will take place from Feb. 8-16, 2025, and marks the first year that winter-specific sports have been part of the Invictus Games. As stated by the Invictus Games' mission, the event aims to support recovery, rehabilitation, and generate a wider understanding and respect for wounded, injured, and ill active duty and veteran military personnel. According to the Invictus Games' description, the event is designed to enhance recovery by engaging service members outside of traditional therapy settings, 'using the power of sport to support recovery, rehabilitation and generate a wider understanding and respect for those who serve their country.' 
Original language: en
Publish date: February 10, 2025 03:57 AM
Source:[DVIDS](https://www.dvidshub.net/image/8863262/team-us-competes-wheelchair-basketball-during-2025-invictus-games)

**Local Canadian Forces members compete, perform at 2025 Invictus Games - Kingston News**
Six local Canadian Armed Forces members are participating in the 2025 Invictus Games in Vancouver, British Columbia. They are part of a 56-person team representing Canada, which includes 22 serving members and 34 Veterans. The team will compete from February 8 to 16, 2025. The Invictus Games support the recovery and rehabilitation of international wounded, injured, and sick service personnel and veterans through sport. The six local participants are Mike, Mark, Brittney, Mark, Theresa, and James, who will compete in various sports such as alpine skiing, sitting volleyball, indoor rowing, and skeleton. They were motivated to apply for the Invictus Games by their desire to confront their fears, rediscover their passion for service, and represent Canada one last time. They are grateful for their families and the support of their healthcare professionals, and have learned valuable lessons about the importance of self-advocacy, acceptance, and seeking help.
Original language: en
Publish date: February 10, 2025 03:26 AM
Source:[Kingstonist News - 100% local, independent news in Kingston, ON](https://www.kingstonist.com/news/local-canadian-forces-members-compete-perform-at-2025-invictus-games/)

**Free Prime Gaming February 2025 Titles Have Been revealed!**
Prime Gaming has revealed its free offerings for February 2025, including 20 new titles for PC gamers. The titles are available on various platforms, including Amazon Luna, which allows fans to play without downloading. Some of the titles include BioShock Infinite Complete Edition, Surf World Series, and Devil May Cry 5. Amazon Luna will also add new titles, such as Batora: Lost Haven and HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2. Prime Gaming members can download the titles for keeps, allowing them to bolster their backlogs without extra charge. The offerings are available to fans in the US, UK, Canada, Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, the Netherlands, and Poland.

**PlayStation Store Weekend Offers: Up to 90% Off on Selected Titles**
After a 24-hour PSN blackout, Sony has apologized to users by offering 5 additional free days to all PlayStation Plus subscribers. Additionally, the company has made available the Weekend Offers on the PS Store, exclusively for subscribers. These promotions will last for a few hours and will allow users to save up to 90% on selected titles, including Crysis Remastered, Darksiders III, Destroy All Humans, and more. The full list of offers includes over 80 games and DLC, available for PlayStation Plus subscribers only. It's recommended to act quickly, as the Weekend Offers will end on February 11, 2025. 'We thought it was a good idea to suggest the most interesting offers on PlayStation Store,' said the article, highlighting the best deals. 'As always, we recommend checking the official website for more information and to take advantage of these promotions.'

**Local to Compete in Invictus Games**
The 2025 Invictus Games will be held in Vancouver and Whistler, British Columbia, from February 8-16, featuring a hybrid of winter and summer sports. Team Canada has 56 participants competing in 11 sports against over 500 competitors from 25 countries. Meaford resident Jeremy Janssens will be competing in swimming and sitting volleyball for Team Canada, saying, 'This is probably the most serious I’ve taken it in a long time because now I have a goal.' The Invictus Games focus on empowerment through sport and teamwork, rather than medal count, with the goal of encouraging recovery through an active lifestyle. Janssens said, 'This is all about recovery through sports and teamwork.' The games are supported by the Canadian Forces' Soldier On program and the True Patriot Love Foundation, which aims to create understanding and respect for people who are currently serving or previously served their country.

**Xbox Game Pass: New Games for February 2025 Revealed**
Xbox Game Pass will feature 7 new games in February 2025, including a highly anticipated exclusive title for the Microsoft platform. The service will also include a sports game related to the NFL, which has been a popular topic this month. In addition, independent titles will be added, which often go unnoticed. However, users must have a subscription to Xbox Game Pass to download the new games. To access the new titles, users can go to the 'Game Pass' section of their Xbox account and search for the game they want to download. The new titles should appear first, but users can also use the search bar to find them.

**Sony Reveals February 2025 'Free' Games for PlayStation Plus Subscribers**
Sony has revealed the list of 'free' games for PlayStation Plus subscribers in February 2025. The list includes PayDay 3, a shooter game, High on Life, a comedy shooter, and Pac-Man World Re-Pac, a platformer. However, to access these games, users need to have a PlayStation Plus subscription, which costs 8.99 euros per month for the 'Essential' tier, 13.99 euros per month for the 'Extra' tier, and 16.99 euros per month for the 'Premium' tier. The games will be available for download on February 4, 2025, at 11:00 AM German time. 'It's a great opportunity for gamers to enjoy some free games without having to pay a cent extra,' said a spokesperson for Sony Interactive Entertainment. 'We're excited to offer our subscribers a wide range of games, including some of the most popular titles in the industry.'

**Sony Reveals PlayStation Plus Games for February 2025**
Sony has announced the list of games that will be available to PlayStation Plus subscribers in February 2025. The lineup includes Payday 3, High on Life, and Pac-Man World Re-Pac, which can be downloaded from February 4 to March 3. For those who missed the January offerings, Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit Remastered, and The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe will be available until February 3. Sony also revealed that starting from January 2026, PlayStation Plus will focus on PS5 games, gradually phasing out PS4 support, as stated by Sony officials.

**PS Plus February 2023 Free Games Announced**
Sony has announced the free games for PS Plus members in the US and Europe for February 2023. There are three games to choose from, available for download from February 4 to March 3. **Top Downloaded Games on PlayStation Store in 2024**
Sony has released the list of most downloaded games on the PlayStation Store for 2024. In Europe, EA Sports FC 25 is the top game, followed by Call of Duty: Black Ops 6. In the US, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 takes the top spot. The top 20 most downloaded games on PS5 in Europe are: EA Sports FC 25, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, Grand Theft Auto V, HELLDIVERS 2, EA Sports FC 24, Hogwarts Legacy, Black Myth: Wukong, Sea of Thieves, DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, It Takes Two, UFC 5, ASTRO BOT, The Crew Motorfest, Marvel's Spider-Man 2, ELDEN RING, Phasmophobia, Cyberpunk 2077, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege, and Gran Turismo 7. The same list for the US includes Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, EA Sports College Football 25, HELLDIVERS 2, NBA 2K25, Grand Theft Auto V, EA Sports Madden NFL 25, Black Myth: Wukong, DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, EA Sports FC 25, NBA 2K24, Madden NFL 24, MLB The Show 24, FINAL FANTASY VII REBIRTH, Hogwarts Legacy, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege, Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, Marvel's Spider-Man 2, ASTRO BOT, and Sea of Thieves. The top 20 most downloaded games on PS4 in Europe are: Minecraft, EA Sports FC 25, Red Dead Redemption 2, Need for Speed Heat, A Way Out, Grand Theft Auto V, EA Sports FC 24, The Forest, Batman: Arkham Knight, Need for Speed Payback, The Crew 2, Kingdom Come: Deliverance, Gang Beasts, Hogwarts Legacy, Fallout 4, Unravel Two, Mortal Kombat X, STAR WARS Battlefront II, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, and theHunter: Call of the Wild. The same list for the US includes Minecraft, EA Sports FC 25, Red Dead Redemption 2, Need for Speed Heat, A Way Out, Grand Theft Auto V, EA Sports FC 24, The Forest, Batman: Arkham Knight, Need for Speed Payback, The Crew 2, Kingdom Come: Deliverance, Gang Beasts, Hogwarts Legacy, Fallout 4, Unravel Two, Mortal Kombat X, STAR WARS Battlefront II, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, and theHunter: Call of the Wild. The top 10 most downloaded games on PS VR2 in Europe are: Beat Saber, Pavlov, Arizona Sunshine 2, Among Us VR, Call of the Mountain, Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy’s Edge – Enhanced Edition, Job Simulator, Creed: Rise to Glory – Championship Edition, Metro Awakening, and Swordsman VR. The same list for the US includes Beat Saber, Pavlov, Arizona Sunshine 2, Among Us VR, Call of the Mountain, Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy’s Edge – Enhanced Edition, Job Simulator, Creed: Rise to Glory – Championship Edition, Metro Awakening, and Swordsman VR. The top free-to-play games on PS4 and PS5 in Europe are: 'to be determined' (no information provided in the article).

**Sony Reveals Most Downloaded Games for PS4 and PS5 in Brazil in 2024**
Sony has released a list of the most downloaded games for PS4 and PS5 in Brazil in 2024. EA Sports FC 24 and EA Sports FC 25 dominated the top 2 spots for PS5, while Hogwarts Legacy took third place, followed by Grand Theft Auto V. On the other hand, Red Dead Redemption 2 topped the list for PS4, followed by Minecraft, Need for Speed Heat, and EA Sports FC 24 and EA Sports FC 25 in the fourth and fifth positions. The most downloaded games for PS5 in Brazil in 2024 are: EA Sports FC 25, EA Sports FC 24, Hogwarts Legacy, Grand Theft Auto V, Black Myth: Wukong, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, Mortal Kombat 11, Resident Evil 4, Marvel’s Spider-Man 2, and Gran Turismo 7. For PS4, the most downloaded games are: Red Dead Redemption 2, Minecraft, Need for Speed Heat, EA Sports FC 24, EA Sports FC 25, Grand Theft Auto V, Batman: Arkham Knight, Mortal Kombat 11, The Crew 2, and Hogwarts Legacy. The most downloaded games for PS VR2 in Brazil in 2024 are: Beat Saber, Horizon Call of the Mountain, Among Us VR, Drums Rock, Pavlov, Creed: Rise to Glory – Championship Edition, Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy’s Edge – Enhanced Edition, Crossfire: Sierra Squad, The Dark Pictures: Switchback VR, and Kayak VR: Mirage. The most downloaded free games in Brazil in 2024 are: Roblox, Fortnite, eFootball, Call of Duty: Warzone, Stumble Guys, Fall Guys, VALORANT, Rocket League, Asphalt Legends Unite, and Marvel Rivals.

Publish date: January 24, 2025 02:37 PM
Source:[gamevicio.com](https://www.gamevicio.com/noticias/2025/01/sony-revela-os-jogos-mais-baixados-para-ps4-e-ps5-no-brasil-em-2024/)

**Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and Minecraft Lead PS5 and PS4 Downloads in 2024**
Sony has released statistics on game downloads on PlayStation consoles in the US, Canada, and Europe for the entire 2024 year. The results are interesting: gamers were actively interested in both new releases and proven hits from previous years. For example, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 was the most downloaded game on PlayStation 5 in the US and Canada, and second in Europe, behind EA Sports FC 25. In North America, College Football 25 and Helldivers 2 followed Black Ops 6, while in Europe, the cooperative action game from Arrowhead Studios took fourth place, ahead of Grand Theft Auto 5. Regional differences affected games outside the top three. For example, Final Fantasy VII Rebirth took 14th place in the US and Canada, but did not make it to the top in Europe, where Elden Ring took its place. Cyberpunk 2077 and It Takes Two were also popular in Europe, but not in North America. Meanwhile, Warhammer 40000: Space Marine 2 took 17th place in the US and Canada, but did not make it to the top in Europe.

**PlayStation Store Top Downloads Of 2024 For PS5 Include Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, EA Sports FC 25**
Sony Interactive Entertainment has released the top downloads for the PlayStation Store across 2024. Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 took the top spot in the US for PS5, while EA Sports FC 25 grabbed the top spot in EU regions. Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 also made second place in the EU. Other entries in the top 10 include Helldivers 2, Grand Theft Auto V, and Hogwarts Legacy, which continued to prove its popularity despite being released in February 2023.

**Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Tops PlayStation 5 Downloads in 2024**
Sony has released data on the most downloaded games on PlayStation 5 consoles in the US, Canada, and Europe for 2024. According to the data, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 was the most downloaded game in the US and Canada, while in Europe it ranked second after EA Sports FC 25. In the US and Canada, College Football 25 came in third, followed by Helldivers 2. In Europe, Grand Theft Auto V took fourth place, pushing Helldivers 2 to fifth. The data also showed significant differences in the top downloaded games between the US, Canada, and Europe. For example, Final Fantasy VII Rebirth ranked 14th in the US and Canada, while it did not make the top list in Europe. On the other hand, Elden Ring was popular in Europe but not in the US and Canada. Cyberpunk 2077 and It Takes Two were also more popular in Europe than in the US and Canada. Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, however, was popular in the US and Canada, ranking 17th.

**Most Downloaded Games on PlayStation Store for December 2024**
Sony Interactive Entertainment has released the most downloaded games on the PlayStation Store for December 2024. The statistics were divided into two regions (Canada/USA and Europe) and platforms. For PlayStation 5 owners, the top downloads were sports games and Call of Duty: Black Ops 6. Meanwhile, owners of previous generation consoles preferred Red Dead Redemption 2, but those in the US and Canada also downloaded Call of Duty: Black Ops 6. **Marvel Rivals Surpasses Fortnite and Roblox in PlayStation Downloads in December**
Sony has released data on the most downloaded games on PlayStation consoles in Europe, the US, and Canada for December 2024. According to the data, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 was the most downloaded game on PlayStation 5 in the US and Canada, while EA Sports FC 25 was the most downloaded game in Europe. The second and third places in the US and Canada were taken by NBA 2K25 and EA Sports FC 25, respectively, while in Europe, Black Ops 6 and Hogwarts Legacy took the second and third places. Grand Theft Auto V was the fourth most downloaded game in all regions. Another game that appeared in the top 7 in both lists was the cooperative horror game Phasmophobia, which surpassed Cyberpunk 2077, Star Wars Jedi: Survivor, Marvel's Spider-Man 2, Astro Bot, and other popular games in Europe and the US/Canada. 'It's interesting to see how the gaming landscape has changed,' said a spokesperson for Sony. 'Games like Phasmophobia and Grand Theft Auto V continue to be popular among players, while new releases like Hogwarts Legacy are also gaining traction.'

forecasters.initial_reasoning: To forecast how many of Sony's top video game downloads in US/Canada will be sports games in February 2025, I begin by considering historical data on the prevalence of sports games in top download lists. In past years, sports games typically account for a significant portion of top downloads due to their broad appeal and seasonal launches. For the sake of establishing a base rate, I observe that in many years, around 2 to 4 sports games consistently appear in top lists due to the popularity of franchises like FIFA, NBA 2K, and Madden NFL. Given recent trends, I assign initial probabilities with a skew towards the lower mid-range outcomes.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Seasonal Sports Franchises
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: Sports games often release new versions annually, typically around the same time, aligning with the start of sports seasons. February might still see the momentum of holiday season sales resulting in higher download numbers for sports games.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Broader Gaming Trends
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: While sports games remain popular, the gaming industry is seeing an increasing trend towards narrative-driven and open-world games, which could capture more of the top download spots.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Marketing and Events
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: Major sporting events or marketing campaigns by game makers can boost downloads of sports games. February sometimes coincides with the conclusion of the NFL season and the build-up to other leagues' marketing, potentially boosting sports game popularity.

forecasters.initial_reasoning: To determine the initial probability distribution for the number of Sony's top video game downloads being sports games, I will rely mainly on historical data regarding video game popularity. Historically, sports games have consistently been popular within the US and Canada markets, particularly in the context of franchises like FIFA, Madden NFL, and NBA 2K. However, they usually constitute only a portion of the top game charts. Let's assume, based on such a historical approach, that the top charts list typically includes around 2-3 sports games among its top 10 most popular games.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Current Sports Game Trends
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: Current trends in sports gaming, fueled by regular annual releases of sports franchises, can impact their popularity. The presence of major sports events or seasons can also boost the popularity of specific sports games.

perspective_derived_factors.name: New Non-sports Game Releases
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: The release of highly anticipated non-sports games, like a blockbuster RPG or shooter, can dominate the download charts and reduce the relative proportion of sports games.

forecasters.initial_reasoning: To establish the initial distribution, I consider historical data on the popularity of sports video games in the US/Canada market. Typically, sports games, including titles like FIFA, NBA 2K, and Madden NFL, have consistently featured prominently in top download charts, especially during peak sporting seasons or when games are newly released. Historically, I've observed that there are usually about 1 to 3 sports games in the monthly top charts, providing a base rate for these outcomes.
